description:
TuneWiki Lyrics Search is a simple lyrics search application based on TuneWiki's vast, community contributed database of song lyrics from around the world.  

Ever wonder who sings that one song?  TuneWiki's library of over 2.5 million songs can help!  Find the song by searching for the name of the song, or browsing an artists discography, or just by typing in a piece of the lyrics - we'll find it for you!  

Once you find the song, you can launch YouTube directly for that song, or translate it into more than 40+ languages instantly!

*** UPDATE *** we heard your requests, you wanted the ability to add songs as favorites... you got it!  Just tap the star on any song to make it a favorite.  From the main screen, tap the star to view/manage/reorder/delete your favorite songs!
